TopicTitle: Is Science Mode with Kerbal XP Possible

Articles.Content:
Pretty much as the title.

I enjoy the mechanic of collecting science and unlocking the tech tree. I'm also a fan of the Kerbal XP system and the effect it has on the game play.

Not much interested in the finial and mission elements of a full career game though.

Science mode is pretty much perfect for me but has no Kerbal xp system. Anyone know of a save edit or mod that could unlock that element.

Edited May 1, 2015 by Tewkes

It's a bit kludgey, but you hack the save game and give yourself a billion funds. If you somehow manage to spend it all, just hack it back in.

It's not that hard. Open your persistent.sfs and look for this text:


	SCENARIO
	{
		name = Funding
		scene = 7, 8, 5, 6
		funds = 898328.386742344
	}

Just change that funds number to 10000000000000 or something.

Thanks.

Ive done the add unlimited funds before and it works fine as a work around. Just wondered if there was a more elegant solution or a simple config toggle that could be used instead.
